p: Super absorbent polymers (SAPs) ( Figure 9) offer a low energy alternative to de-water brown and fine black coal particles and the tailings [ 10, 11, 38, 39, 40]. SAPs can be cationic, anionic or non-ionic and comprise high molecular weight cross-linked hydrophilic polymers that absorb several tens to hundreds of times their individual mass of water as they expand in size, but still preserve distinct particle identity.
